<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Sp.Sites.Lists.Fields.getAllFields"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/clients/{clientId}/sp/sites/{siteId}/lists/{listId}/fields"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This static function retrieves all fields of a SharePoint list using the provided SharePoint
client and list ID.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
